channel.title: Shops
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm having some difficulty trying to find a shop.
I looked a loads of tuts on it. I gotta look for //Zeke, but i can't find it anywhere on the code.
Im running a 317 server which the source files are layed out as 508.
Please give me a hint, I don't want spoonfeed, just a bit of help plox.
Cheers.

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Trying to find a shop?

TO add a new shop on a 317:

Use autospawn.cfg to spawn the NPC that you will use as a shopkeeper.
Open shops.cfg and add a shop, or just make note of a current shop that you would like to use.
Now go to your client.java and search for “wanneshop” and add copy the others in there, applying your NPC and the shop number in WanneShop(

Read full topic
